channel.title: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)
channel.description: Ok, I am trying to make a server - --- - volcom-scape.no-ip.info, im using Testscape Source...I want to be the owner of my server...can anyone tell me how to do that?? Post below if you plz?

item.title: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)
item.dc:creator: @Soras_Shad0w Soras Shad0w
item.description:
@Soras_Shad0w wrote:

I do have a folder names DATA but nothing bout staff,admins, and mods…

Read full topic

item.source: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)

item.title: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)
item.dc:creator: @yoshimtu yoshimtu
item.description:
@yoshimtu wrote:

ok go inside the folder “characters” then select your username. hit alt+f and search character-rights = 0

change that to

character-rights = 1
For mod

character-rights = 2
For admin

character-rights = 3
for owner

Read full topic
item.source: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)

item.title: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

Go into ur server file find your name set ur stats to 1 - mod 2 - admin or 3 - owner then log out and in and u will be owner.

Read full topic

item.title: How to be a Owner in a source (HELP!)
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

her is a tuts: To make ur User Search for

Code:
//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

And under that u will see something like this:

Code:
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 2;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}
else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Username here”))
{
playerRights = 1;
}

If i dont think wrong the playerRights = 3; does not work so make it
Code:
playerRights = 2;

and another one:http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,87912.0.html

Read full topic
